title: How to Get Unlimited Cash and Bounty in Need for Speed Most Wanted: PC Edition

steps.title: Visit the Save Editor download page.
steps.content: Visit the Save Editor download page. On your computer browser, go to the download page on Media Fire. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the green download button on the page.
steps.content: Click the green download button on the page. This will download a zipped file named NFS Most Wanted - Save Editor.rar to your computer.

steps.title: Extract the Save Editor file.
steps.content: Extract the Save Editor file. Locate NFS Most Wanted - Save Editor.rar on your computer, right-click, and select “Extract here.”

steps.title: Transfer the SaveEditor.exe file to your desktop.
steps.content: Transfer the SaveEditor.exe file to your desktop. Do this by dragging the file onto the desktop using your mouse.

steps.title: Run SaveEditor.exe by double-clicking it.
steps.content: Run SaveEditor.exe by double-clicking it. The name of your NFSMW 2005 alias (the name you saved your profile as) should be displayed in the alias box on the application. If your save game files (the files in which your progress in the game is stored) are in another location other than the default path, type the path in the box labelled “Folder containing saved profiles” and click ‘Update.”

steps.title: Enter the value for Money and Bounty.
steps.content: Enter the value for Money and Bounty. Do this in the boxes marked with “Money” and “Bounty” respectively. You can type any value you want. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click “Save.”
steps.content: Click “Save.” This will instantly update your Need for Speed Most Wanted cash and bounty balances with the figures you entered.

steps.title: Open the Career menu.
steps.content: Open the Career menu. On the game’s Main Menu, press Enter to select the first item on the menu, which is “Career.”

steps.title: Open the Safe House menu.
steps.content: Open the Safe House menu. On the Career menu, press Enter to choose the first item on the menu, which is “Resume Career.” This will open the Safe House menu.

steps.title: Resume your free roam game.
steps.content: Resume your free roam game. On the Safe House menu, select “Resume Free Roam.” This will take you to the streets of Rockport, the fictional city on which the game’s storyline is based.

steps.title: Drive around the streets.
steps.content: Drive around the streets. Use the Up Arrow key to accelerate, Down Arrow key to brake, Left and Right Arrow keys to steer left or right respectively.

steps.title: Try to engage the cops in a pursuit.
steps.content: Try to engage the cops in a pursuit. You can do this by doing the following: Ramming police vehicles. Ramming other civilian cars. Speeding. Driving in the oncoming lane. Knocking down signposts and billboards by driving on the curb.

steps.title: Head over to the bus station in Graypoint as soon as you’ve got the cops on your tail.
steps.content: Head over to the bus station in Graypoint as soon as you’ve got the cops on your tail. Graypoint is at the very middle of the Rockport City map (which you can view by pressing M on your keyboard).

steps.title: Smash through the bus station window.
steps.content: Smash through the bus station window. You will see a ramp where you can get on top of a ledge.

steps.title: Drive to the top of the ledge and stop.
steps.content: Drive to the top of the ledge and stop. Normally, the cops will not be able to climb onto the ledge. You will accumulate unlimited bounty as they continue to unsuccessfully try to bust you. [3] X Research source
